 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בָּל‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==mind== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.*** [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>529</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***heart***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׂם ב‎</span> [[Dan.6.15|Dan 6:15]] (followed by Infinitive; compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>l.c.</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 80</sup>).
